scripts.about:start: echo 'Start the tools, as a TypeScript command line application'
scripts.about:eslint: echo 'Perform linting of the source code. This may modify the source files.'
scripts.about:build: echo 'Run the TypeScript compiler to generate the build output.'
scripts.about:prettier-check: echo 'Check the formatting of the source code (without fixing formatting errors).'
scripts.about:prettier: echo 'Ensure the right formatting of the source code, automatically fixing formatting errors.'
scripts.about:generate-third-party: echo 'Update the ThirdParty.json file with the most recent dependency versions'
scripts.about:docs-prepare-directory: echo 'Prepare the output directory for the API definition file'
scripts.about:docs-extract-api: echo 'Extract the API definition file from the current build output.'
scripts.about:docs-generate-markdown: echo 'Generate the API documentation based on the API definition file'
scripts.about:docs-generate: echo 'Generate the API documentation based on the current build output'
scripts.about:docs: echo 'Perform a build and generate the API documentation based on the build output'
scripts.about:package-clean: echo 'Delete the contents of the 'build' output folder'
scripts.about:package-prepare: echo 'Prepare a package: Linting, formatting, build, test, documentation, and third-party information updates'
scripts.about:package-copy: echo 'Copy the entry point for the application from the bin to the build directory'
scripts.about:package: echo 'Prepare a package that can then be published on NPM'
scripts.docs-generate: npm run docs-prepare-directory && npm run docs-extract-api && npm run docs-generate-markdown
scripts.docs: npm run build && npm run docs-generate
scripts.package-prepare: npm run eslint && npm run prettier-check && npm run build && npm run test && npm run docs-generate && npm run generate-third-party
scripts.package: npm run package-clean && npm run package-prepare && npm run package-copy && npm pack
